title: I-a-need-a-tasty Pizza font....
content:
I've already got the DiGiorno logo for the top done, but I need the "Microwave" font.....I just...can't......figure...it....!  
(I really picked a bad week to go caffeine free....)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DiG-MW.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015130/http:/typophile.com/files/DiG-MW.jpg) | 92.27 KB |
author: dunnyman

comments.content:
Addendum.: _( Well, And to solve this.. :)_  
_The original type used would be_ ' [Mercurius](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015130/http:/www.clubtype.co.uk/mercurius.html)', _by [Adrian Williams](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adrian%20Williams)_..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015130/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Thank you!!!! Formlos, you are a major part of this site being a huge help for everyone, and are MUCH appreciated!!!

Thanks a lot, Greg, for your kind words..  
_Thank you.._

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401015130/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Greg, keep off the caffine, it only gets easier. Try tea, it has caffine but it also has chemicals in it that counteract the caffine's effect. This summer I always had Ice tea and Lemonade (homemade) in the frigerator. Also drink lots of water. Coffee with caffine hasn't passed my lips in 3+ years.
